name: Movies with "Big" in the Title! Multiple Choice Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: A truck driver gets lost in a dark alley and ends up trying to save a green-eyed Chinese girl, caught up in a supernatural world of good versus evil.  Can you name this 1986 film?
questions.explanation:
Big Trouble in Little China.

	Kurt Russell and Kim Cattrall starred in this action comedy that was directed by John Carpenter.  Although this movie became a classic after it was released on video it only made $11,100,000 dollars at the US box office.

questions.text: A boy goes on an adventure to recover his stolen beloved bicycle.  During the journey he meets an ex-con, a waitress, and a gang of bikers.  What is this comedy from 1985?
questions.explanation:
Pee Wee's Big Adventure.

	Tim Burton directed "Pee Wee's Big Adventure" in 1985.  Phil Hartman had a brief appearance as a reporter in the film and also helped Paul Reubens write the script.

questions.text: A teenage boy writes an essay that gets accidentally placed in the hands of a Hollywood producer.  The boy makes a trip to Los Angeles to recover his story and get out of having to attend summer school.
questions.explanation:
Big Fat Liar.

	"Big Fat Liar" starred Frankie Muniz, Amanda Bynes, and Paul Giametti.  This film had a slew of cameo appearances by several television stars, such as Dustin Diamond and Kenan Thompson.

questions.text: Sonny Koufax is a lazy guy who gets put in a situation where he must care for a young boy.  He uses this to his advantage, to show his girlfriend that he can be a mature adult.  Along the way Sonny discovers what he really wants out of life.
questions.explanation:
Big Daddy.

	This 1999 comedy was directed by Dennis Dugan who is also an actor.  Dennis has starred in such films as "The Benchwarmers", "Parenthood", and "Problem Child".

questions.text: A group of college friends are reunited for a friend's funeral.  During their weekend together they rediscover their friendship and deal with adulthood.
questions.explanation:
The Big Chill.

	"The Big Chill" was shot on location in the same house that was used in the Robert Duvall drama "The Great Santini".  Lawrence Kasdan's sons, Jon and Jacob, appear as children in the film.

questions.text: Nick Chapman won a lot of awards at film school. As young film graduate he gets the opportunity to shoot his very own film in Hollywood.  Along the way he gets caught up in the glamour of it all and his dreams of making his ideal picture soon come crashing down.  What film from 1989 am I talking about?
questions.explanation:
The Big Picture.

	"The Big Picture" had an all-star cast that included Kevin Bacon, J.T. Walsh, Michael McKean, Teri Hatcher, and Jennifer Jason Leigh.  This comedy was released by Columbia Pictures in 1989.

questions.text: David Leary moves back to his hometown to face Roscoe Bigger, who constantly bullied him in his childhood.  These two end up being friends, after realizing that it won't do any good to get back at each other after so many years.  Can you name this Tom Arnold comedy?
questions.explanation:
Big Bully.

	"Big Bully" was filmed entirely in Canada in 1995.  The movie also starred Don Knotts, Curtis Armstrong, and Julianne Phillips as the love interest for Rick Moranis.

questions.text: "This FBI agent is going undercover....and he's concealing more than a weapon".  This is a tagline for which of the following movies?
questions.explanation:
Big Momma's House.

	Martin Lawrence goes undercover to catch a murderer and tries to get the woman of his dreams in the process.  "Big Momma's House" was a huge box office success making over $117,000,000 dollars in the United States.  Martin Lawrence reprised his role of big momma in the 2006 comedy "Big Momma's House 2".

questions.text: A young woman falls in love with a man who doesn't share the same background as her family.  She desperately tries to get her family to accept him, so that they can be married.
questions.explanation:
My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

	The television series "My Big Fat Greek Life" proved to be not nearly as successful as the film version.  It was canceled the first season.  Nia Vardalos wrote "My Big Fat Greek Wedding" based upon her own life experiences with her family.  Tom Hanks and Rita Wilson were producers of this film.

questions.text: All Josh Baskin wanted to be was a grown up.  Well he got his wish.  After learning what it was like to be an adult he decided it wasn't such a hot idea after all.
questions.explanation:
Big.

	Tom Hanks received his first Oscar nomination for his work as the adult Josh Baskin in this Penny Marshall comedy from 1988.  Elizabeth Perkins, John Heard, and Jared Rushton co-starred in this classic comedy.
